name: therai-monorepo
description: TheRAI monorepo with main app and auth app

scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=main-app && npm run build --workspace=auth-app
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=main-app && npm install --workspace=auth-app
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules main-app/node_modules auth-app/node_modules main-app/dist auth-app/dist
